channel.title: Cant compile server
channel.description: Yea every time I try to compile my server it says I do not have JDK 5 or 6 installed and I just install JDK 6 anyone help? :|

item.title: Cant compile server
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

replace your compiler with this

[code]
@echo off

:def
set t=0
set b=7
color %b%%t%

:main
title Java Ownz U’s Compiler v2.0

:menu
cls
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::Java Ownz U’s Utility
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

echo ::
echo :: Things i can do (cus im magic):
echo :: c = Compile your server.
echo :: r = Run your server.
echo :: kil = ProcessKiller
echo :: b = Backup your servers files.
echo :: s = Change settings.
echo :: cords = Location list
echo :: cmd = command generator
echo :: reset = Reset’s your compile logs.
echo :: up = lastes updates
echo :: SM = Shop maker (made by dog eats dog)
echo ::
echo ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo.

set /p mc=:: Pick somin:

if %mc%==c goto com
if %mc%==r goto run
if %mc%==b goto bac
if %mc%==s goto set
if %mc%==cords goto loc
if %mc%==cmd goto cmd
if %mc%==reset goto reset
if %mc%==C goto com
if %mc%==R goto run
if %mc%==B goto bac
if %mc%==S goto set
if %mc%==CORDS goto loc
if %mc%==CMD goto cmd
if %mc%==RESET goto reset
if %mc%==up goto up
if %mc%==UP goto up
if %mc%==SM goto shopmaker
if %mc%==sm goto shopmaker
if %mc%==kil goto kil
if %mc%==KIL goto kil

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Server Compiling
echo ::
echo ::Results:
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
javac *.java
echo :: Swweet your DONE!!
pause
cls
goto main

:kil
Killing Process, lol? im working just play your server XD
tskill java
start call runner
goto start

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
cls
goto main

:bac
:backup
cls
title Backing up files…
echo :: Backing up files…
if not exist Backup mkdir Backup
if not exist Backup\characters mkdir Backup\characters
if not exist Backup\connectedFrom mkdir Backup\connectedFrom
if not exist Backup\data mkdir Backup\data
if not exist Backup\flagged mkdir Backup\flagged
if not exist Backup\logs mkdir Backup\logs
if not exist Backup\moreinfo mkdir Backup\moreinfo
if not exist Backup\savedGames mkdir Backup\savedGames
Echo Starting Backup Copy
copy /V /Y /A *.txt .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.java .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.class .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.cfg .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.bat .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A bans .\Backup\bans
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A connectedFrom .\Backup\connectedFrom
copy /V /Y /A data .\Backup\data
copy /V /Y /A flagged .\Backup\flagged
copy /V /Y /A logs .\Backup\logs
copy /V /Y /A moreinfo .\Backup\moreinfo
copy /V /Y /A savedGames .\Backup\savedGames
echo :: Done.
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: Enter one of the following to change background colour.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo.
echo :: Enter one of the following to change text colour.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:loc
cls
echo :: Below is a list of locations with their coordinates.
echo ::
echo :: 3210 3424 = Varrock
echo :: 2964 3378 = Falador
echo :: 3222 3218 = Lumbridge
echo :: 2757 3477 = Camelot
echo :: 2813 3337 = a patch
echo :: 2966 9633 = somekind of rat-hole never seen this
echo :: 2929 9649 = dragon slayer mace
echo :: 2981 9914 = recipes goblin cook place
echo :: 2916 9912 = heroes guild cave
echo :: 2932 9848 = chaos druids
echo :: 2898 9766 = baby bluedragons
echo :: 2977 9515 = recipes crabs
echo :: 2973 9505 = recipe water “mini-quest”
echo :: 2783 9574 = agility arena
echo :: 2835 9562 = karamja lessers
echo :: 2007 4431 = x-mas workshop event
echo :: 2400 4850 = nature altar!
echo :: 2385 4685 = have a relation to the place above what is that?
echo :: 2525 4776 = evil bob’s island
echo :: 2650 4565 = monkey sadness fight the jungle demon?
echo :: 2650 4508 = monkey sadness the gnome glider puzzle!
echo :: 2152 5095 = Secret island
echo :: 3157 4822 = drill deamon camp
echo :: 2477 4768 = frog cave
echo :: 2596 4780 = freaky forester
echo :: 2095 4428 = prison pete
echo :: 1952 4764 = quiz show
echo :: 2338 4747 = Lost and found
echo :: 1960 4824 = Twarler Mini-Game
echo :: 2015 4826 = twarler mini-game inside
echo :: 1971 5001 = WIERD CHRUCH! NOT ON RUNESCAPE!
echo :: 1928 5002 = Grave digger
echo :: 2584 4838 = fire alter
echo :: 2721 4828 = water alter
echo :: 2784 4840 = mind alter
echo :: 2842 4835 = air alter
echo :: 2898 4819 = rune essent mining
echo :: 3029 4834 = abyss
echo :: 2528 4833 = wierd alter
echo :: 2471 4838 = law alter
echo :: 1823 4835 = two ships
echo :: 3105 3930 = mage arena
echo :: 1894 5333 = secret sky
echo :: 1865 5341 = recipie for desaster feast
echo :: 3424 9891 = under passage way to canfis
echo :: 3681 9889 = ecto plasm floor
echo :: 2470 9899 = under gnomes grand tree
echo :: 2319 9804 = i’bans trap drop
echo :: 2856 3809 = slippery ice path
echo :: 3551 9693 = barrows chest
echo :: 3177 9753 = under draynore mannor
echo :: 3040 9741 = faladore mining guild
echo :: 3079 9505 = toturial mining
echo :: 3110 9512 = toturial combat train
echo :: 3232 2896 = top of piramid for desert tresure
echo :: 3291 2764 = desert city
echo :: 3298 9179 = under desert city
echo :: 2861 3165 = volcano
echo :: 2863 9570 = under volcano
echo :: 2835 3268 = candor
echo :: 2766 3277 = fishing docks
echo :: 2438 5172 = volcano lava
echo :: 2395 5154 = fight pits
echo :: 3234 9896 = wierd place
echo :: 3132 9909 = under edgevill
echo :: 3233 9313 = under piramid at acent alter
echo :: 3363 9639 = mage train up ( shapes )
echo :: 3363 9637 = mage train up ( bones )
echo :: 3365 9637 = mage train up ( alching )
echo :: 3363 2984 = a desert city
echo :: 2396 5093 = fight caves
echo :: 3559 9895 = football traning corse
echo :: 3541 9891 = jumping corse
echo :: 3528 9871 = zip line
echo :: 3539 9872 = jumping steps
echo :: 3555 9947 = cave
echo :: 2972 9507 = Under water
echo :: 2545 4715 = mage arena room
echo :: 2505 4707 = mage arena statues
echo :: 3551 9712 = barrows coffins
echo :: 2716 9816 = black king dragon
echo :: 3487 9493 = kaphite queen place
echo :: 2744 3444 = camalot flax
echo :: 2273 4695 = king black drags
echo :: 2516 4646 = daganoth quest place mother
echo :: 2121 4918 = Draynor private from map
echo :: 2142 4834 = cosmic alter
echo :: 2091 3210 = wierd grass land??
echo ::
pause
cls
goto main

:up
cls
echo :: Here is a list of The lastest Updates for my compiler.
echo ::
echo :: 1) Added more cords to list. (v1.5)
echo ::
pause
cls
goto main

:ShopMaker
title Shop maker
@echo off
cls
echo NPC Id?
set /p NpcId=Option:
If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder
Echo [Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java] >> “.\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt”
Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo WanneShop = 30; >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
goto menu2
:menu2
set /p ShopId=Shop Id:
pause
goto menu3
:menu3
cls
set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop:
pause
goto menu4
:menu4
cls
set /p Cost=Cost of that item:
Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
pause
goto menu5
:menu5
cls
Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
set /p cords=Cords X:
pause
goto menu6
:menu6
set /p coords=Cords Y:
pause
goto menu7
:menu7
Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords% 0 0 0 0 1{ >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
goto finished
:finished
echo finished.
pause
goto menu

:reset
cls
echo Resetting the Compiler’s Logs…
pause
del “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Empty = Yes >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto menu

:cmd
:Star
Set /p CmdName=Command Input?
Set /p RUSure=Real This Name k, click yes than: %CmdName%(yes,no)?
If %RUSure%==no GOTO Star
If not Exist CommandsFolder MD Commands Folder
Echo if (command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo { >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
cls
set /p AY=addItem(k,ko)?
If %AY%==k Goto addItem
If %AY%==K Goto addItem
If %AY%==ko Goto endCode
If %AY%==KO Goto endCode
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
cls
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
cls
echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=Add item, add tele or finish command.(item,Tele,End)
If %AT%==item GOTO addItem
If %AT%==ITEM GOTO addItem
If %AT%==TELE GOTO Tele
If %AT%==tele GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %type%==* goto error
echo.
goto error
:error
cls
echo Commands invalid. Only use commands from the menu.
pause
goto menu
:endCode
cls
Echo } >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /p Again=Make some more commands? (yes, No)?
If %Again%==yes GOTO Star
If %Again%==no goto fin
If %Again%==YES GOTO Star
If %Again%==NO goto fin
:Tele
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Another(item,End)
If %AT%==item GOTO addItem
If %AT%==ITEM GOTO addItem
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode

:fin
echo Command creation complete. Find it in the commands folder.
pause
cls
goto main[/code]

item.title: Cant compile server
item.dc:creator: @rangemage rangemage
item.description:
@rangemage wrote:

I have JDK 6 . 3 and i changed all the 6 stuff here is what it looks like

:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.1_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7)
:checkjavac7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.1_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8)
:checkjavac8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9)
:checkjavac9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10)
:checkjavac10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11)
:checkjavac11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12)
:checkjavac12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5

goto compile2
:setjavac6

:setjavac7

goto compile2
:setjavac8
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac9
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac10
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac11

:setjavac12

item.title: Cant compile server
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

rangemage, don’t listen to them.
they just screwed up your server.
but here is how.
right click your compiler and click “edit”
look for a line where it says something like this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03

now go to your C:\Program Files\Java
and look for the folder that says jdk*.._**
edit those stars with the ones you have as your jdk folder.
save and then click compile.
then, if you really did delete everything below your public boolean process();
you’ll get like a million errors

Read full topic

item.title: Cant compile server
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Search for public boolean process() delete that. Then add :

[code] public void GetBonus() {
for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
if (playerEquipment[i] > -1) {
for (int j = 0; j < 9999; j++) {
if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null){
if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId == playerEquipment[i]) {
for (int k = 0; k < playerBonus.length; k++) {
playerBonus[k] += server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].Bonuses[k];
}
break;
}
}
}
}
}
}
public void WriteBonus() {
int offset = 0;
String send = “”;
for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) {
if (playerBonus[i] >= 0) {
send = BonusName[i]+": +"+playerBonus[i];
} else {
send = BonusName[i]+": -"+java.lang.Math.abs(playerBonus[i]);
}

		if (i == 10) {
			offset = 1;
		}
		sendFrame126(send, (1675+i+offset));
	}
	CalculateMaxHit();
	/*for (int i = 4000; i <= 7000; i++) {
		sendFrame126("T"+i, i);
		println_debug("Sended: Test"+i);
	}*///USED FOR TESTING INTERFACE NUMBERS !
}
public void CalculateMaxHit() {
	double MaxHit = 0;
	int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus
	int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength
	if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive
		MaxHit += ((double)((double)StrBonus + Strength) / ((double)6.8275862068965517241379310344828));
	} else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive
		MaxHit += ((double)((double)StrBonus + Strength) / ((double)6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
	} else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled
		MaxHit += ((double)((double)StrBonus + Strength) / ((double)6.7586206896551724137931034482759));
	}
	if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion
		MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.15);
	} else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion
		MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.2);
	}
	if (Str1) { //Burst Of Strength
		MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.005);
	} else if (Str2) { //Super Human Strength
		MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.01);
	} else if (Str3) { //Ultimate Strength
		MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.015);
	}
	if(FullDharokEquipped())
            {
	MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]) - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])/2;
            }
	playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
}
public boolean FullDharokEquipped() {
	if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 &&playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718)
            {
	return true;
            }
	return false;			

}

public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() {
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
return true;
}
return false;
}

public void CalculateRange() {
	double MaxHit = 0;
	int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; //Range Bonus
	int Range = playerLevel[4]; //Range
            {
		MaxHit += (double)(1.00 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.00095));
	} 
	MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.085);
	playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
}

public boolean MageHit(int index) {

if(server.playerHandler.players[index] == null) return false;
int enemyDef = server.playerHandler.players[index].playerBonus[9] + (server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[1] / 4);
int myBonus = playerBonus[4] + (playerLevel[6] / 3);

if(misc.random(myBonus) > misc.random(enemyDef)) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

public boolean M[/code]

where the boolean process used to be.
